content.question: In the fourth sentence of the second paragraph, the authors use the word “qualified” in order to

choices.label: concede that some scientists are not sufficiently prepared for their work
identify a difference between real scientists and fictional characters
explain why not all scientific investigations produce accurate results
note a condition that must be met for an observation to be scientific

content.answer: note a condition that must be met for an observation to be scientific

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
